refnamediv.refpurpose: Store input values in a memory at a given position

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [sim, out] = ld_collectValues(sim, events, in, WriteIndex, memorysize, DefaultVal, inVecsize )

para.para: in * - input vector whose values shall be stored
out *(memorysize) - the vector representing the memory
WriteIndex * INT32 - the index to write the data to; starts at 1
DefaultVal - initialize the storage with this value
vecsize - size of the input vector
